2023-06-11 æ›´æ–°ï¼šé‡‡ç”¨ @å½’è‡§ ã€Šä½¿ç”¨ Umami Api æ˜¾ç¤ºç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®ã€‹ è·å– Token ã€‚

<div class="tongji">æ€»è®¿é—®é‡ <span id="pvStatic">0</span> æ¬¡ | æ€»è®¿å®¢æ•° <span id="uvStatic">0</span> äºº</div>

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    umiTongji();
});
function umiTongji(){
  var umiToken = "o7......w="  //è·å–åˆ°çš„ token
  var umiId = "c27bd84b-02a3-4c3f-a168-0d7fadec9c74" //è·å–åˆ°çš„ websiteId
  var umiTime = Date.parse(new Date());
  var umiUrl = "https://u.edui.fun/api/websites/"+umiId+"/stats?start_at=1672848000000&end_at="+umiTime;
  fetch(umiUrl,{
    method: 'GET',
    mode: 'cors',
    cache: 'default',
    headers: {
      'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + umiToken,
      'Content-Type': 'application/json'
    }
  })
  .then(res => res.json()).then(resdata => {
    document.querySelector('#pvStatic').innerHTML = resdata.pageviews.value
    document.querySelector('#uvStatic').innerHTML = resdata.uniques.value
  });
}
